title: THAW360 TNThps MOD PACK V. [XBOX360]
description:
Tony Hawk's American Wasteland Xbox360
TNTHPS .XEX MOD PACK
Mods by: TNT <a href="
http://TNThps.us" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://TNThps.us</a>

---------------------------------

Version: 2.2
- More info in the READ ME.txt

---------------------------------

Simply place the included folders into the xex directory and run the game!

Overwrite all files.
- The included folders don't replace every file, so don't delete the original folders first.

Works great with: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11454357/Tony_Hawks_American_Wasteland_[XBOX360][JTAG_RIP]" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11454357/Tony_Hawks_American_Wasteland_[XBOX360][JTAG_RIP]</a>

---------------------------------

Create-a-Skater Mods:
- Flawless Infinite Scales (allows you to turn things inside-out!)
- Added hidden items (including the topless female shirt option 'Sport Bra'!)

Menu Mods:
- Debug Options (Pause game, click Game Options, click Debug Options)

Added Hidden Level Mods:
(These are for Story Mode, use the Debug Menu to Unlock All Levels in Story!)
- Viewer (blank world skater floats endlessly in)
- Testlevel (Neversoft testlevel used to test the game during development)
- Char Test (a debug option that shouldn't be a level, freezes the game)

In-Game Mods:
- Perfect Balance (SEE IMPORTANT NOTE BELOW!!!)
- Infinite Run Timer (SEE IMPORTANT NOTE BELOW!!!)
- No Out-of-Bounds (walk and skate on water, pungees, and out-of-bounds areas)
- Air Shuffle (wallrun up a wall, or stand completely still, and then rapidly tap 'A' to run through the air)
- Wallride Shuffle (hold 'Y' to wallride and rapidly tap 'A')
- Grind Shuffle (hold 'Y' to wallride and rapidly tap 'A')
- No Grind Gravity (allows you to grind up rails without stopping)
- Inline Mod (spray paint anything and quickly hold the left joystick forward to run for the effect)

---------------------------------

IMPORTANT NOTE: This mod pack is designed special for people who don't like Perfect Balance
and Infinate Run Timer. There are two .xex files included, default.xex and default_pb.xex.

Default.xex loads all the mods, except for Perfect Balance and Infinite Run Timer.
Default_pb.xex loads all the mods, including Perfect Balance and Infinite Run Timer.

---------------------------------

Known bugs:

- Pause Menu Screen Mode changed to Dcreen Mode - side effect of changing SOUND to DEBUG, not worried about it, menu still works fine.
